intro: Coilantha, commonly known as the spiral flower, is a unique plant characterized by its spiral-shaped inflorescence. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes carrots and parsley, and is native to South America. The plant features small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in a helical pattern around a central stem. Its leaves are finely divided and resemble those of other members of its family. Coilantha is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its distinctive and intricate floral structure.
